website_summaries.verdict: If you are fighting fungus in your fish tank or are looking for an effective preventative, this is the antifungal medication to choose for your finned pets.
pros: Benefits the health of your aquarium fish, as it can be used as both a preventative and treatment
Treats fungus and other conditions, including mouth rot and ick
cons: Only suitable for fish with scales, so you'll have remove other aquatic life such as crustaceans and mollusks from your tanks prior to treatment

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This medication saved my 2 year old fish’s life. He stayed on the bottom of the tank for over a week, hardly moving. His entire underside was covered in a cotton-like fungus. After 4 days of this medication in the water, it all cleared up and he was his normal self again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: Killed my fish in hours.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as described. One tablet for every 10 gallons, predispose in a bucket if over 40 gallons and removed my carbon pads from the filter. After 12-14 hours i wake up the next day to almost my entire tank dead. Two balla sharks I've had for a few years now dead and a three year old angel fish dead. It not only didn't help the few danios with the illness it poisoned my healthy fish! I will absolutely NEVER buy tetras dropsy medication again and warn anyone getting to rethink if this one is best for them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These brough Goldemort back to health
customer_reviews.text: Bought these at the first sign of fin rot in my son's goldfish. They turn the water green for a while, and you need to remember to pull the charcoal filter cartridge out, but one treatment worked very well. Now Orangey, Orangey, Orangey, and Goldemort are healthy as can be.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaClan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but it’s unnecessary to purchase 2 boxes per transaction
customer_reviews.text: It was a great purchase as my fishes needed some medicine,,, BUT It’s not a great value as you have to purchase +2 boxes at the same time as they are not sold individually. I ended up needing only 2 capsules, so now I have more than a box and a half just laying in a shelf where mist likely I’ll never use them again. But it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: SabrinaG

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fish had started getting a white film on them and the pet store attendant recommended these, but they were out of stock. Price was better on amazon and they were in hand in 24 hours with additional shipping. Ordered and they worked perfectly, just know that water will turn green for about 24 to 36 hours but will clear up.
customer_reviews.author: Green_Eyed_Bandit

customer_reviews.title: Aquarium care
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product to deal with a problem in my aquarium. Fungus guard cleared up the issue and saved my fish. Product arrived as described and on time. Recommend and will use this vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sick fish still died, but the ones not yet sick survived. Stained all air tubes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well at half dose won't harm clown loaches
customer_reviews.text: Had one fish with the beginning signs of dropsy (pine cone look) I removed the fish and carefully inspected other fish (no signs) and treated the tank with this product This is the first time I have used it and the first time that I had a sign of dropsy and got it under control immediately So I would say this works. Side notes: I did half the recommended dose because I have clown loaches It did not harm my live plants
customer_reviews.author: Jud123$&1279$$&

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: doesn't really help much on my sick fishes.. they ended up dead =(
customer_reviews.author: Ray Y

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Work great on swimmers bladder also found it to knock out various bacteria in early stage.
customer_reviews.author: laura lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ITEM SHIPPED VERY FAST-ITEM AS DESCRIBED BRAND SPANKING NEW-THANK U
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL CHIN

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't treat the fungus at all. It killed 4 of my fish and my snail. So yea I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B

customer_reviews.title: Still fighting the fungus
customer_reviews.text: Tho they aren't getting worse, my little betas fungus issues aren't getting better :(.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Negron

customer_reviews.title: Worked very quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Had a few cardinal tetra with fin rot, and this cleared it up in just a few days. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: extremecomfort

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed how my fish recovered from a fungus. I thought he was a goner, but the fungus cleared up in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Memere Jackie

customer_reviews.title: does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Works great for your fish couldn't ask for anything better
customer_reviews.author: Jacobsreviews

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clear up fin rot on some of my fish. This stuff cleared it up really quick. One thing to be sure of is to make sure you remove the carbon from your filter. If you don't, it will remove the medication from the water. These will also turn the water in your tank a blueish green, that will clear up in about 2 days. The package says that it may stain things in the tank, but I have not found that to be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Bennymo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to work with in smaller tanks
customer_reviews.text: One tablet, 10 gallon tank. I have a 2.5 gallon, had to break up the tablet and guess dosage. I do not like doing that when it comes to a sick fish. Will switch to something else because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Not really that good.
customer_reviews.text: My betta fish Joe was getting some cotton fungus again and he wasn't look too hot, so I bought this. after one day of using it I didn't see any results. I think this made him sick, he now refuses to eat and hardly moves. I hope he doesn't die. :'(
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself time and go to the store!
customer_reviews.text: Would have been nice if the actual tablets were included in the box!
customer_reviews.author: Oleander226

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care
customer_reviews.text: It says on the package that it contains a chemical known to cause cancer in California. I bought it as a preventative measure. I'll only use it if something goes wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tangalang

customer_reviews.title: Tetra Fungus Guard
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for my tropical fish when they have fungus issues.
customer_reviews.author: 2craftymom

customer_reviews.title: Get a hospital tank if you have fish that are not compatible with this treatment
customer_reviews.text: My Goldie that I had for YEARS came down with a bad case of fungus, he was already floating upside down quickly I put him in a hospital tank with these tablets and he was better within 24 hours, also my other Goldie’s that seemed to have ick which I was treating with Super Ich Cure which honestly only seemed to make it worst I switched them to the fungus guard and SOMEHOW it’s been curing them, I’m still VERY confused about that because it very much looked like ick but the ick medicine did NOTHING, over all it’s helping my fish a lot
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought at my local pet store. Keeps fungus at bay, but doesn't completely kill it in the tank. One fish gets cured, only to have another get infected. I have been using it consistently for over 4 months and can't completely clear the tank of fungus (maybe that is Tetras strategy to keep profits flowing). I am not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Person

customer_reviews.title: I've been having recurring fungus outbreaks in my tank for ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been having recurring fungus outbreaks in my tank for about the past 4 months. I use this product, the fungus seems to die off and go away. But a few weeks later fungus regrows and I start over. I'm not sure if there's a stronger product on the market that would eliminate it completely, but so far this has been effective as a band-aid.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

product_meta.title: Tetra Fungus Guard Aquarium Remedy, Easy to Use Fizz Tabs, 8-count
product_meta.description:
For 50 years, fishkeeping enthusiasts have looked to the Tetra name for products and solutions that add ease and beauty to their home. Whether you're an experienced hobbyist or just starting out, Tetra has everything you need–-from a large variety of quality fish food and innovative equipment to test kits and decor. Tetra Fizz Tabs are fast dissolving pre-measured tablets that make caring for your aquarium faster, easier, and more convenient. 
Fungus Guard treats a variety of fungus and bacteria-related conditions on tropical ﬁsh and Goldﬁsh including:
Fungus: White or grey cottony growth or patches on ﬁsh
Tail, Fin, or Mouth Rot: Soft tissue eaten away around mouth, tail, or ﬁn. Possible redness at base of area.
Hemorrhagic Septicemia: Red streaks on ﬁns or body with no signs of skin damage.
Clamped Fins: Fins held close to body, especially in livebearing ﬁsh.
Dropsy: Bloated with scales standing out. Also clears open red sores, eye cloud (hazy ﬁlm on eyes), pop eye (enlarged eyes), and swim bladder disease (ﬁsh swims upside down or on side.)
feature_bullets: age range description: All Life Stages
included components: Tetra Fungus Guard Aquarium Remedy, Easy to Use Fizz Tabs, 8-Count

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
